thread.title: UAE- ERC provides assistance to needy families in Jordan's Zarqa Governorate
thread.title_full: UAE- ERC provides assistance to needy families in Jordan's Zarqa Governorate | MENAFN.COM

author: Emirates News Agency (WAM)
title: UAE- ERC provides assistance to needy families in Jordan's Zarqa Governorate
text:
(MENAFN - Emirates News Agency (WAM)) The Emirates Red Crescent, ERC, resident team has provided assistance to a number of needy families in Jordan's Zarqa Governorate in cooperation with the Orthodox Charity Association.

The beneficiaries thanked the UAE government and the Emirates Red Crescent for their relief efforts and initiatives and prayed to Allah Almighty to bless the soul of the late Sheikh Zayed bin Sultan Al Nahyan. They also extended their best wishes to President His Highness Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan for continued good health.
